projects.title: WE ALL DESERVE A SAFE SPACE TO BECOME OURSELVES
projects.description: An experiment in programming language; expressive, demonstrative language. A fluid language that takes shape and makes meaning. This is a poem I wrote with the help of chroma.js for color and velocity.js for motion.
projects.instruction: Press the boxes to start poem
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='Everything We Are-Morphing Poem' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/oeGbWM/?height=300&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: Transformative Constellations
projects.description: I have always wanted an interface to explore the relationships between us, our words, and the world. The interactive diagram is made using Cytoscape.js, which is a graph-theory (a.k.a. network) library written in JavaScript. The simple UI is constructed using CSS Grid Layout.
projects.instruction: Each node can be dragged and rearranged, as can the constellation as a whole.
projects.link: <iframe height='475' scrolling='no' title='Interactive Constellation Diagram CSS Grid Layout' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/eGOjZw/?height=495&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: IMAGINING THE SHADOW CAST BY OUR WORDS
projects.description: Playing with movement and meaning. Radiating colors and their corresponding constellation of feeling. Using chroma.js and velocity.js to do most of the heavy lifting.
projects.instruction: Press buttons above wonderland to change color theme

projects.title: Transformative Language
projects.description: Velocity.js and Particles .js to create an interactive environment in honor of the goddess Octavia Butler.
projects.instruction: Hover and press on letters and particles to interact.

projects.title: Interactive Audre Lorde Reflection Activity
projects.description: Proof of concept for interactive activities that use vue.js to manage real time user input, and produce a manipulatable environment for users to engage with their own thoughts and lives as a site of reflection and transformation. In this instance the interactive canvas is produced using raphael.js.
projects.instruction: Type your responses to the prompt questions and then press the ‘re-create’ button to generate an interactive canvas.
